DOC.brief_summary: The objective study capture gastrointestinal tolerance ( GI ) information nutrient dense oral nutritional supplement ( ONS ) healthy elderly subject .
DOC.criteria: Subjects eligible study meet follow inclusion criterion : Male female ≥ 60 ≤ 90 year age . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > 20 < 35 . Subjects exclude study meet follow criterion : History diabetes Antibiotic use within 1 week prior enrollment Undergone major surgery le 3 month prior enrollment . Current active malignant disease treat within last 6 month cancer . Immunodeficiency disorder . Myocardial infarction within last 3 month . Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) . Allergy ingredient study product . Obstruction gastrointestinal tract major gastrointestinal disease . Dementia , brain metastasis , eat disorder , history significant neurological psychiatric disorder . Unintentional weight loss weight gain ≥ 5 % last 4 week . Taking medications/dietary supplements/substances could profoundly modulate metabolism affect GI motility .
